attributes.action: Take an active stance in the elimination of anti-social behaviour, and to also enforce tougher laws preventing anti-social behaviour of young people
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As you may or may not know we as a country and a nation have an extreme problem with the culture known as chavs. They are Imbecilic, un-educated, stupid idiots. They have limited or no intelligence, and there knowledge of technology is limited to mobile phones and ipods, where everything in their culture that plays music is referred to as an ipod, as they have an extremely short attention span due to the lack of a brain, meaning it is impossible for them to learn anything new, they know how to operate primitive electronic devices via a primordial instict from their teenage parents. They have no understanding of basic language, and they have a limited vocab. They are an imminent threat to national security, they are more dangerous than terrorists as they will attack you personally if you are not a chav. If they do take over we will no longer be the united kingdom, we will be the unikey kingdom of burberry.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
